channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lack Of Diversity In Imagery Impacts Take-Up Of Cycling, Says Research
item.description: Analysis commissioned by climate charity Possible shows that images of cyclists—including those in the media—are not representative enough.

item.title: The Increasing Use Of AI In Education
item.description: One of the lasting impacts in this latest wave of AI interest is its impact on the way people learn and teach.
